snippet: Swansea City's under-fire manager Bob Bradley was heckled by the club's fans and skipped his media duties after a crushing 3-0 defeat at Middlesbrough on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Swansea City's under-fire manager Bob Bradley was heckled by the club's fans and skipped his media duties after a crushing 3-0 defeat at Middlesbrough on Saturday.

headline.main: Bradley Under Fire as Feeble Swansea Slump Again
headline.print_headline: Bradley Under Fire as Feeble Swansea Slump Again
